error.message: Symfony\Component\HttpFoundation\RequestStack::getMasterRequest() is deprecated in drupal:9.3.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0 for Symfony 6 compatibility. Use the forward compatibility shim class Drupal\Core\Http\RequestStack and its getMainRequest() method instead.

Symfony\Component\HttpFoundation\RequestStack::getMasterRequest() is deprecated in drupal:9.3.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0 for Symfony 6 compatibility. Use the forward compatibility shim class Drupal\Core\Http\RequestStack and its getMainRequest() method instead.

Symfony\Component\HttpFoundation\RequestStack::getMasterRequest() is deprecated in drupal:9.3.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0 for Symfony 6 compatibility. Use the forward compatibility shim class Drupal\Core\Http\RequestStack and its getMainRequest() method instead.

Call to deprecated function GuzzleHttp\Psr7\parse_header(): parse_header will be removed in guzzlehttp/psr7:2.0. Use Header::parse instead.
